title: Implement secure login with multi-factor authentication
description: As a customer, I want a secure login mechanism using multi-factor authentication, so that my access to the service is protected.
attributes_and_rules: The system must use a combination of credentials (e.g., passwords, OTPs, biometrics) that comply with PCI DSS and GDPR standards.
acceptance_criteria: The system should validate the user's credentials using two or more factors.
test_cases: Given a user, when they enter their password and OTP, then they should be granted access if both are correct.

title: Include secure password recovery and timeout management
description: As a customer, I want secure password recovery options and session timeout management, so that I can recover access without compromising security.
attributes_and_rules: Provide secure methods for recovering passwords and manage session timeouts to enhance security.
acceptance_criteria: The system should allow users to securely recover their password and automatically timeout inactive sessions.
test_cases: Given an inactive session, when the timeout is reached, then the session should be terminated.

title: Develop a dynamic customer-specific dashboard
description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see my relevant banking information and offerings.
attributes_and_rules: The dashboard should dynamically update based on customer activities and interests.
acceptance_criteria: The dashboard should display real-time updates of account summaries, transactions, and offers.
test_cases: Given a customer with recent transactions, when they log in, then the dashboard should show their latest transactions.

title: Develop a responsive interface for all devices
description: As a customer, I want a responsive user interface, so that I can access the portal from any device.
attributes_and_rules: The interface should comply with WCAG 2.1 AA standards and adapt to various devices.
acceptance_criteria: The UI should be accessible and consistent across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
test_cases: Given a mobile device, when the portal is accessed, then the interface should display appropriately for mobile use.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Create streamlined workflows for account opening
description: As a customer, I want an intuitive workflow for opening new accounts, so that I can complete the process easily online.
attributes_and_rules: The workflow should minimize manual inputs and ensure compliance with KYC and AML requirements.
acceptance_criteria: The workflow should guide the user through the account opening process with pre-filled data and automatic validations.
test_cases: Given a customer with existing records, when opening a new account, then the system should pre-fill relevant data.

title: Allow saving and resuming of incomplete applications
description: As a customer, I want to save my progress in applications, so that I can resume later from any authenticated device.
attributes_and_rules: The system should enable secure session recovery and protect saved information.
acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to save and resume their application progress securely from any device.
test_cases: Given an incomplete application, when the user saves and resumes later, then the application should continue from the last saved checkpoint.

title: Implement secure document upload functionality
description: As a customer, I want to upload required documents securely, so that my application can be processed without risks.
attributes_and_rules: Documents must be encrypted during upload and at rest. Include file type validation and malware scanning.
acceptance_criteria: The system should securely upload and validate documents, providing rejection handling and notifications.
test_cases: Given a document to upload, when the upload is complete, then the document should be securely stored and validated.

title: Enable real-time tracking of requests and notifications
description: As a customer, I want to track my requests in real-time, so that I know the status and receive updates.
attributes_and_rules: The system should provide full visibility into request statuses and send automated notifications via email or SMS.
acceptance_criteria: Customers should be able to see their request status and receive timely notifications.
test_cases: Given a submitted request, when there is an update, then the customer should receive a notification.

epic_title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Trail
title: Maintain secure log of customer interactions
description: As an administrator, I want to view interaction history, so that I can audit and generate compliance reports.
attributes_and_rules: Logs must include detailed activity records and be immutable. Provide user access to personal interaction history.
acceptance_criteria: The system should maintain a secure log of all interactions with access for audits and reports.
test_cases: Given recorded interactions, when an audit is required, then the administrator should access detailed logs.

title: Integrate self-service portal with core banking system
description: As a developer, I want to ensure seamless data exchange between the portal and the core banking system, so that the data is always synchronized.
attributes_and_rules: Use secure APIs for real-time bidirectional data flow and ensure high availability and reliability.
acceptance_criteria: The portal and core banking system should stay synchronized in real-time.
test_cases: Given changes in account data, when updated in the core system, then the portal should reflect those changes immediately.

title: Implement role-based access control system
description: As an administrator, I want to assign access levels based on user roles, so that data and services are securely restricted.
attributes_and_rules: The system must align with the principles of least privilege and be configurable at function and data levels.
acceptance_criteria: Users should have access only to the data and services appropriate for their role.
test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, when accessing the portal, then they should see only permitted data and services for their role.

epic_title: Dedicated Portal Database and System Optimization
title: Design an optimized database for the portal
description: As a system architect, I want a dedicated database for the portal, so that performance and reliability are ensured.
attributes_and_rules: Include encryption, query optimization, caching, and load balancing for high availability.
acceptance_criteria: The database should handle portal transactions efficiently and support high availability.
test_cases: Given a peak load condition, when queries are executed, then the database should respond efficiently without downtime.
